channel.title: Hugo Theme Fuji
channel.description: Recent content on Hugo Theme Fuji

item.title: Flag of Canada
item.description: Flag of Canada From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia Jump to navigationJump to search This article is about the national flag of Canada. For other Canadian flags, see List of Canadian flags. Canada Flag of Canada (Pantone).svg Name The Canadian Flag The Maple Leafl’Unifolié (French) Use National flag, civil and state ensign Small vexillological symbol or pictogram in black and white showing the different uses of the flag Small vexillological symbol or pictogram in black and white showing the different uses of the flag Flag can be hung vertically by hoisting on a normal pole, then turning the pole 90° Proportion 1∶2 Adopted February 15, 1965; 57 years ago Design A vertical triband of red (hoist-side and fly-side) and white (double width) with the red maple leaf centred on the white band.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Placeholder Text
item.description: Lorem est tota propiore conpellat pectoribus de pectora summo.

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.

item.title: About me
item.description: My name is Inigo Montoya. I have the following qualities: I rock a great mustache I’m extremely loyal to my family What else do you need? my history To be honest, I’m having some trouble remembering right now, so why don’t you just watch my movie and it will answer all your questions.
